featured.text: Nowadays many companies adopt a ______ work schedule which allows their employees to decide when to arrive at work—from as early as 6 a.m. to as late as 11 a.m. (A) relative (B) severe (C) primitive (D) flexible 2.
Still others think that most aliens visit Earth to study us like our scientists study primitive natives and animals, and have no interest in helping us __(40)__.

definition.zh_def: 原始的；未開化的；基本的
definition.en_def: Relating to the earliest stages of development; simple or basic.
definition.example: The primitive tools used by early humans were made from stone and wood.
